CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1964, pg. 1, reads: "Youthful Creativity - Youths at Miller School under the instruction of Mrs. Aldora Frazier (rear, center), have an outstanding hit in their original dance-and-sing, based on the Stephen Foster melody, "Nellie Bly." Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eighteen girls, including two wearing berets and tunics, and holding palettes, posed on stage with teacher Aldora Frazier, center, at Miller Elementary School for Nellie Bly dance and sing
